# Time Series Data with xts and zoo
xts stands for Extensible Time Series

```{r}
library(xts)
library(zoo)
# XTS = MATRIX + INDEX
x <- matrix(1:6, ncol = 2, nrow = 3)
x

idx <- as.Date(c("2020-05-09", "1989-05-09", "2019-09-17"))
idx

X <- xts(x = x, order.by = idx)
X
```
